info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 4 at 10:44AM CDT until June 5 at 2:23AM CDT by NWS Wichita KS
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas...
Cottonwood River near Plymouth affecting Lyon and Chase Counties.
Neosho River near Erie affecting Neosho County.
Neosho River near Chanute affecting Neosho and Allen Counties.
Neosho River at Iola affecting Allen County.
Neosho River near Parsons affecting Neosho and Labette Counties.
Neosho River at Oswego affecting Labette and Cherokee Counties.
Cottonwood River at Cottonwood Falls affecting Chase County.
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas...
Cottonwood River near Florence affecting Marion County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Cottonwood River near Florence.
* WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight.
* IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Outside the levee system in southeast Florence, flood waters flow across Park Ave Road and reach the foundation of a residential home. Northwest of Florence, the bridge on 140th Road and 1/2 mile west of Highway 77 floods.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 23.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 5.0 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don't drown.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 1045 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT
